alert.note: Alert for Mahaska (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 4:56PM CDT until March 31 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN POWESHIEK AND NORTHEASTERN MAHASKA COUNTIES... At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coal Creek, or 12 miles northeast of Oskaloosa, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Deep River and Barnes City. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central and central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
